300.name: Common Supply Crate
300.description: A basic supply crate containing essential materials and items. Buy on cooldown for steady progression!

301.name: Uncommon Supply Crate
301.description: An improved supply crate with better materials. Regular purchases accelerate your progression!

302.name: Rare Supply Crate
302.description: A rare supply crate filled with higher quality materials. Great for mid-game advancement!

303.name: Mythic Supply Crate
303.description: A powerful supply crate containing valuable resources. Essential for late-game progression!

304.name: Legendary Supply Crate
304.description: The ultimate supply crate packed with the best materials. Buy regularly to maximize progress!

400.name: Boss Room Keycard
400.description: A keycard used to access restricted boss arena.

starter_ship.name: Ship
starter_ship.description: A certified, pre-owned ship your uncle found in a scrapyard.
